title: DSC 209R Deceptive Visualization Webpage
description: A data visualization project exploring deceptive design techniques using real-world datasets.

title: CSCI 3308 MovieMaster Webpage
description: MovieMaster is a centralized platform for movie lovers who want a one-stop-shop for finding their next Movie. This website pulls ratings and reviews from credible movie review pages such as IMDb, TMDB, and MetaCritic.

title: DSC 209R Expository Visualization
description: A data visualization project exploring whether highly processed foods are cheaper per calorie than minimally processed foods.

title: Machine Learning Benchmark Deployment Automation
description: Used Bash scripts and Python to automate dataset retrieval, container deployment, and benchmark testing for multiple Machine Learning models.
